languages.text: "Обрушил на врага с небес всю нашу ярость. Вспахал твердь Ефрата-II снарядами, расколол их оборону, низверг укрепленные башни, вверг в хаос... И в этом яростном вихре повел свою славную стаю пролагать кровавый путь кэрлам железных жрецов".

"I would rain down vengeful skies upon the enemy. I would plough the land of Eufrates II with shells, shatter their defences, level the fortified towers, throw their host into disarray... And in that whirlwind of fury, I would lead my glorious pack to pave a path of blood for the cog-kaerls."
languages.original_text: "Обрушил на врага с небес всю нашу ярость. Вспахал твердь Ефрата-II снарядами, расколол их оборону, низверг укрепленные башни, вверг в хаос... И в этом яростном вихре повел свою славную стаю пролагать кровавый путь кэрлам железных жрецов".

traits.locale_text: "I would bring the vengeful skies down upon the enemy. I would plough the land of Eufrates II with shells, shatter their defences, level the fortified towers, throw their host into disarray... And in that whirlwind of fury, I would lead my glorious pack to pave a path of blood for the cog-kaerls."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “我会朝敌人倾泻无尽的怒火。我会用炮弹犁平欧夫拉茨二号星的土地，击穿他们的阵线，夷平坚固的高塔，让敌人的军队陷入混乱……在狂怒的风暴之中，我会率领我光荣的狼群身先士卒，杀出一条血路，指引那些浑身齿轮的武装农奴前进。”
languages.original_text: "I would rain down vengeful skies upon the enemy. I would plough the land of Eufrates II with shells, shatter their defences, level the fortified towers, throw their host into disarray... And in that whirlwind of fury, I would lead my glorious pack to pave a path of blood for the cog-kaerls."

traits.locale_text: “我会朝敌人倾泻无尽的怒火。我会用炮弹犁平欧夫拉茨二号星的土地，击穿他们的阵线，夷平坚固的高塔，让敌人的军队陷入混乱……在狂怒的风暴之中，我会率领我光荣的狼群身先士卒，杀出一条血路，指引那些浑身齿轮的武装农奴前进。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Je ferais pleuvoir la vengeance sur notre ennemi. Je retournerais la surface d'Euphrate-II à coups d'obus, j'anéantirais leurs défenses, je raserais leurs tours fortifiées, je sèmerais le chaos dans leurs rangs... Et dans cette tempête de rage, à la tête de ma meute glorieuse, je dégagerais un chemin ensanglanté pour les technokaerls. »
languages.original_text: "I would rain down vengeful skies upon the enemy. I would plough the land of Eufrates II with shells, shatter their defences, level the fortified towers, throw their host into disarray... And in that whirlwind of fury, I would lead my glorious pack to pave a path of blood for the cog-kaerls."

traits.locale_text: « Je ferais pleuvoir la vengeance sur notre ennemi. Je retournerais la surface d'Euphrate-II à coups d'obus, j'anéantirais leurs défenses, je raserais leurs tours fortifiées, je sèmerais le chaos dans leurs rangs... Et dans cette tempête de rage, à la tête de ma meute glorieuse, je dégagerais un chemin ensanglanté pour les technokaerls. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「俺だったら敵に復讐の雨を降らせる。ユーフラテス・IIの領土を砲弾で蹂躙し、防衛網を粉々にし、城塞塔をまっ平にして敵の軍勢を混乱に陥れる…そしてその怒りの渦の中で、我が栄光の群れを率いて、歯車のカールたちのために血の道を切り開くだろうな」
languages.original_text: "I would rain down vengeful skies upon the enemy. I would plough the land of Eufrates II with shells, shatter their defences, level the fortified towers, throw their host into disarray... And in that whirlwind of fury, I would lead my glorious pack to pave a path of blood for the cog-kaerls."

traits.locale_text: 「俺だったら敵に復讐の雨を降らせる。ユーフラテス・IIの領土を砲弾で蹂躙し、防衛網を粉々にし、城塞塔をまっ平にして敵の軍勢を混乱に陥れる…そしてその怒りの渦の中で、我が栄光の群れを率いて、歯車のカールたちのために血の道を切り開くだろうな」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «Tiznaría de venganza los cielos que cubren al enemigo. Araría la tierra de Eufrates II con proyectiles, destrozaría sus defensas, arrasaría las torres fortificadas, desorganizaría sus huestes... Y en esa vorágine de furia, guiaría a mi gloriosa manada en nuestro cometido de dejar un rastro sangre de esos engranakaerls».
languages.original_text: "I would rain down vengeful skies upon the enemy. I would plough the land of Eufrates II with shells, shatter their defences, level the fortified towers, throw their host into disarray... And in that whirlwind of fury, I would lead my glorious pack to pave a path of blood for the cog-kaerls."

traits.locale_text: «Tiznaría de venganza los cielos que cubren al enemigo. Araría la tierra de Eufrates II con proyectiles, destrozaría sus defensas, arrasaría las torres fortificadas, desorganizaría sus huestes... Y en esa vorágine de furia, guiaría a mi gloriosa manada en nuestro cometido de dejar un rastro sangre de esos engranakaerls».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Ich würde den rachsüchtigen Himmel auf den Feind herabregnen lassen. Ich würde das Land auf Eufrates II mit Granaten pflügen, ihre Verteidigung zertrümmern, die befestigten Türme dem Erdboden gleichmachen, ihre Armee ins Chaos stürzen ... Und in diesem Wirbelwind des Zorns würde ich mein glorreiches Pack anführen, um einen Weg aus Blut für die Zahnrad-Kaerls zu ebnen."
languages.original_text: "I would rain down vengeful skies upon the enemy. I would plough the land of Eufrates II with shells, shatter their defences, level the fortified towers, throw their host into disarray... And in that whirlwind of fury, I would lead my glorious pack to pave a path of blood for the cog-kaerls."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde den rachsüchtigen Himmel auf den Feind herabregnen lassen. Ich würde das Land auf Eufrates II mit Granaten pflügen, ihre Verteidigung zertrümmern, die befestigten Türme dem Erdboden gleichmachen, ihre Armee ins Chaos stürzen ... Und in diesem Wirbelwind des Zorns würde ich mein glorreiches Pack anführen, um einen Weg aus Blut für die Zahnrad-Kaerls zu ebnen."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Göğü düşmanın başına yıkardım. Eufrates II'yi bombaya boğar, savunmalarını yerle yeksan eder, tahkim edilmiş kalelerini ezer geçer, saflarını keşmekeşe sürüklerdim. Bu hengâmenin ortasında görkemli sürüme önderlik ederek dişli müstahdemlere kanlı bir yol açardım."
languages.original_text: "I would rain down vengeful skies upon the enemy. I would plough the land of Eufrates II with shells, shatter their defences, level the fortified towers, throw their host into disarray... And in that whirlwind of fury, I would lead my glorious pack to pave a path of blood for the cog-kaerls."
